name: The Looper's Path
description:
Welcome to The Looper's Path!

A short puzzle game where you control Looper a robot who have self-cloning powers!


well... but don't worry too much: they are not evil ones....

Looper needs to find his way out of every level...

But wait! 

His clones are not really capable of solving the puzzles by themselves, so they just repeat what he did before each round. 

Are you ready to help him?
